Reviews.Title: Not 60ft of cable
Reviews.Author: george lingle
Reviews.Content: Easy to install,easy setup. The only issue I noticed it says 60 feet of cable but it is only 54 feet.mapped out the routing for 60 feet,6 feet short so I had to reroute
